SELECT cl.course_no, cl.users_no AS 'write_users_no', cl.course_name, cl.course_difficulty, cl.course_length, cl.course_time, cl.course_hit, cl.course_region, cl.course_date, cl.course_open, cl.course_introduce
FROM course_list cl

SELECT cl.course_no, cl.users_no AS write_users_no, cl.course_name, cl.course_difficulty, cl.course_length, cl.course_time, cl.course_hit, cl.course_region, cl.course_date, cl.course_open, cl.course_introduce, clike.course_like_no, clike.login_users_no, CASE WHEN clike.login_users_no IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_liked FROM course_favorites cf JOIN course_list cl ON cf.course_no = cl.course_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT course_like_no, course_no, users_no AS login_users_no FROM course_like WHERE users_no = #{users_no} ) clike ON cl.course_no = clike.course_no WHERE cf.users_no = #{users_no} order by cl.course_no desc

select cl.course_no, cl.users_no, cl.course_name, cl.course_difficulty, cl.course_length, cl.course_time, cl.course_hit, cl.course_region, cl.course_date, cl.course_open, cl.course_introduce, clike.course_like_no, clike.course_no, clike.users_no from course_list cl left join (select course_like_no, course_no, users_no from course_like where users_no = #{users_no}) clike on clike.course_no = cl.course_no

select crl.review_no, crl.course_no, crl.users_no, crl.review_content, crl.review_date, ul.users_name, ul.users_nickname from course_review_list crl left join course_list cl on crl.course_no = cl.course_no left join users_list ul on ul.users_no = crl.users_no where crl.course_no = #{course_no}
mapper.insert: insert into course_review_list values ( null, #{course_no}, #{users_no}, #{review_content}, now() )
mapper.delete: delete from course_favorites where users_no = #{users_no} and course_no = #{course_no}
delete from course_like where users_no = #{users_no} and course_no = #{course_no}
